column18: 02/26/2014: Assailants attacked border police guards in Mary province, Turkmenistan. Three security officers were killed and two were injured in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, sources attributed the attack to Taliban members who crossed over from Afghanistan. The Taliban denied responsibility for the incident.
column126: \\"\"Afghanistan: Taliban Deny Killing of Turkmenistan Border Security Forces"
column129: 2014.\",\"\"\"Afghan Taliban Militants Reportedly Kill Three Turkmen Border Guards"
column132: 2014.\",\"\"\"Afghanistan: Taliban militants kills 3 border guards of Turkmenistan"
